name: Portatl
description:
Portatl is a puzzle game. You are a pear. There are boxes. There are portals. There are pairs of portals. There is a pear (you) going through pairs of portals. There are no pairs of pears, only pairs of pairs (of portals).

Why does our sweet and fruity protagonist want to get to that flag? I don't know. Nobody does. Nobody except the pear, that is.

My only regret is not naming this peartal, but alas the logo had already been made.
